docs.title: Pexels Images/Video Downloader
docs.text: This is a runnable which downloads very large amount of Images and Videos along with it's metadata from Pexels by using it's Free API. Bypassing it's API-key request limit by using 12 different API keys in loop after one another continuously.

docs.title: Usage Guide
docs.text: To start downloading Images/Videos there two ways:-

docs.title: 1. By mannualy installing all dependencies and run 'index.js'
2. Open the folder and run the .bat file
A Directory structure will look like this:
